content.body: Hi, I've seen references to a shared calendar, but where is the URL? I can't find it in https://github.com/tc39/how-we-work
The public calendar is linked at https://github.com/tc39/how-we-work/issues/94
andreabergia: you are probably more interested in the private calendar for delegates.  info is in the readme of the reflector repo
content.formatted_body: andreabergia: you are probably more interested in the private calendar for delegates. info is in the readme of the reflector repo
